faqs.question: What should I do if I buy a TrimUI Smart Pro without a microSD card?
faqs.answer: If your TrimUI Smart Pro doesn’t come with a microSD card, you will need to purchase one (recommended size: 64GB or larger). Additionally, you must install a firmware before using the console. Check the Guides page for step-by-step instructions.

faqs.question: What custom firmwares are available for the TrimUI Smart Pro?
faqs.answer: The TrimUI Smart Pro supports multiple custom firmwares, including MinUI, Knulli, StockMix, CrossMix, and others. For detailed installation guides and comparisons, visit the Firmwares page.

faqs.question: Looking for a community to ask questions or talk about games and the console?
faqs.answer: Join the community on Reddit or chat with other handheld gaming enthusiasts on the Retro Handhelds Discord.

faqs.question: Where can I find the full technical specifications of the TrimUI Smart Pro?
faqs.answer: You can view all technical details and specs of the TrimUI Smart Pro on the Specs page.

faqs.question: How can I compare the TrimUI Smart Pro with other handheld consoles?
faqs.answer: If you're unsure whether the TrimUI Smart Pro is the right console for you, check out RetroCatalog for a comparison with other handheld devices.

faqs.question: Where can I find more information about Pokémon ROM hacks?
faqs.answer: For discussions, recommendations, and downloads of Pokémon ROM hacks, visit the dedicated community on r/PokemonROMhacks.
